code_SemperKI.connections.content.session¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2024

Contains: Offers an interface to access the session dictionary in a structured way

Attributes¶

logger

Classes¶

StructuredSession

Interface class that handles the session content

ProcessManagementSession

Offers an interface equal to that of the postgres, albeit session based

Module Contents¶

checkIfUserIsClient(userHashID, projectID='', processID='')¶

See if the user is the client of either the project or the process

Parameters:

  • userHashID (str) – The hashed ID of the user/organization

  • projectID (str) – The ID of the project

  • processID (str) – The ID of the process

Returns:

True if user is client, false if not

Return type:

bool

updateProject(projectID: str, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProjectUpdates, content: dict)¶

Change details of an project like its status.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – project ID that this project belongs to

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed project details

  • content (json dict) – changed project, can be many stuff

Returns:

Flag if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

updateProcess(projectID: str, processID: str, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProcessUpdates, content: dict, updatedBy: str) → tuple[str, dict] | Exception¶

Change details of a process like its status, or save communication.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – Project that this process belongs to

  • processID (str) – unique processID to be edited

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed process details

  • content (json dict) – changed process, can be many stuff

  • updatedBy (str) – ID of the person who updated the process (for history)

Returns:

The relevant thing that got updated, for event queue

Return type:

tuple[str,dict]|Exception

deleteFromProcess(projectID: str, processID: str, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProcessUpdates, content: dict, deletedBy: str)¶

Delete details of a process like its status, or content.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – Project that this process belongs to

  • processID (str) – unique process ID to be edited

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed process details

  • content (json dict) – deletions

  • deletedBy (str) – ID of the person who deleted from the process (for history)

Returns:

Flag if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

getProcessesPerPID(projectID)¶

Retrieve infos about one project, for admins

Parameters:

projectID (str) – project of interest

Returns:

list of all processes of that project

Return type:

list

checkIfFilesAreRemote(projectID: str, processID: str) → bool¶

If at least one file is remote, say so to trigger upload to remote for new files as well

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – The ID of the project that the process is part of

  • processID (str) – The ID of the process in question

Returns:

True if remote, false if local

Return type:

bool

createDataEntry(data, dataID, processID, typeOfData: code_SemperKI.definitions.DataType, createdBy: str, details={}, IDofData='')¶

Create an entry in the Data history

Parameters:

  • data (Dict in JSON) – The data itself

  • dataID (Str) – The ID of that date

  • processID (str) – process it belongs to

  • typeOfData (DataType) – The type of this data

  • createdBy (Str) – Who created it (hashed ID)

  • details (JSON Dict) – Some metadata

  • IDofData (Str) – If the data has an id, save it

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

None

deleteAllDataEntriesOfProcess(processID: str) → None¶

Delete all entries in history of the process from session

KISS-backend
